name: Stop the AI
description:
A puzzle game that engages a different kind of puzzle, by challenging you to try to make the AI lose.

Come play and see the AI squirm :D. And do not be afraid, we have lots of these cute little robots coming, so go ahead enjoy.

This game was made for the WOWIE Jam, make sure to check it out and leave some feedback if you like ;)
